name: DataHub Erde und Umwelt
description: Portal/Viewers in earth-data.de, NFDI-contribution. Aggregator for repositories and SDIs. Search for Data and more. Viewer-Examples, embed SDIs by OGC-WCS. Concept for Data Sharing/Exploration also in Projects, allows exploring governmental data (GDI-DE). Data exploration across different sources. Interactive for meta-data exploration. Interoperable Infrastructures in DataHub beyond common file/metadata formats and provision for download.
